item.description:
Clint Clemens
Monday, November 10, 2008

You must register for this program through the CIPNE web site at http://www.cipne.org...

Clint Clemens has made a career of photographing boat, bikes, and automobiles–literally anything that moves. Increasingly, many of his high-concept images rely on Computer Generated Imaging, High Dynamic Range Imaging and Immersive Environments. Explore the future of photography with Clint in this forward-looking presentation.


Clint’s work in advertising photography has consistently won numerous awards, including Andies, Clios, and an overall first in the Kellys. His photographs have also been featured in many magazines.

In the course of his work, he travels many thousands of miles each year, shooting and interpreting the world as he sees it. His passion is cars and sports, and literally anything that moves.

His account list over the last several years includes Coke, Toyota, Prada, Porsche, Jaguar, Mercedes, BMW, Volvo, Volkswagen, The North Face, New Balance, Harley-Davidson, Chris Craft, and Nokia.

Hilton Garden Inn
420 Totten Pond Rd.
Waltham, MA 02451

Registration: 6:00–7:00pm
Program: 7:00–9:00pm

Cost: CIPNE Members, Free; Guests, $35; Full-time Students, $10.

Pre-registration is required for this program.
Click here to register (Non-members may pay by PayPal)
Please note: on-line registration closes November 7th.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: CIPNE Program: Clint Clemens
